title: Virtual World-Based Project Learning: Job-Related English Communication Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English Conversation Skills and Fundamental Workplace Communication Competency
context.additional_context: Practitioners perform project-based tasks using virtual world platforms (e.g., mobile-compatible metaverse). They acquire job-related English expressions through real-time collaboration and role-playing activities in smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can utilize job-related English expressions with 80% accuracy through role-playing based on work scenarios in virtual world environments.
Learners can complete project planning and presentations in English with peers using smartphone-based collaboration tools.
Learners can apply three or more formal/informal English communication strategies tailored to business contexts through social interactions in virtual spaces.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
